name: Out of Body (itch) (dextilitygamer, Justros, InfernoMV, burusume, SirWaltherdon)
name_original: Out of Body (itch) (dextilitygamer, Justros, InfernoMV, burusume, SirWaltherdon)
description:
What happens when a big demon is jealous of a small demon?

Well then the small demon is cursed to be connected to a human. Follow along as the human and demon go trough the trials to finally be seperated from each other again
